hero.title: Build Your Professional CV, Effortlessly
hero.subtitle: Create a stunning, ATS-friendly CV in minutes. Our AI-powered platform helps you highlight your skills and experience to land your dream job.

features.title: Why Choose CV Craft?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create the perfect CV.

ai.title: AI-Powered Suggestions
ai.description: Get intelligent, context-aware suggestions to improve your CV content based on job descriptions.

templates.title: Beautiful Templates
templates.description: Choose from a selection of professional, creative, and minimal templates to match your style.

preview.title: Real-time Preview
preview.description: See your changes instantly with a live preview of your CV as you type.

templates.title: Find Your Perfect Look
templates.subtitle: Professionally designed templates to make you stand out.

testimonials.title: Loved by thousands of job seekers
testimonials.subtitle: See what our users are saying about CV Craft.

one.quote: CV Craft helped me create a professional CV in minutes. I got three interview invitations within a week!
one.author: Sarah L.
one.title: Marketing Manager

two.quote: The AI suggestions are a game-changer. It's like having a personal career coach review your CV.
two.author: Michael B.
two.title: Software Developer

three.quote: I've always struggled with formatting my CV. The templates are beautiful and so easy to use.
three.author: Jessica P.
three.title: Graphic Designer

header.subtitle: Build your perfect CV with ease and a touch of AI.
